name: 42-19 blue cloud beanie
notes:
**knitted hat for baby and children in drops merino extra fine. piece is knitted in rib. size 0 - 4 years**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
drops design: pattern me-079-by
yarn group b

----------------------------------------------------------

**size**:
0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years
fits head circumference in cm: approx. 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 (48/50 - 50/52)

**materials**:
drops merino extra fine from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
50-100-100-100 (100-100) g colour 19, light grey blue

needles for size 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 months:
drops double pointed needles size 3.5 mm

needles for size 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years:
drops circular needle size 3.5 mm: length: 40 cm
drops double pointed needles size 3.5 mm
the technique magic loop can be used â€“ you then only need circular needle of 80 cm.

**knitting tension:**
22 stitches in width and 30 rows vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
note! remember that needle size is only a suggestion. if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles. if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles.
